overview:
Celine Vignal is the Chief Communications Officer and Co-founder at Zyxio. As a media marketing and PR expert with deep relationship base in consumer electronics, Celine is a featured speaker and viral marketing expert. She is in charge of overseeing and developing Zyxio’s global marketing strategy including brand, audience, go-to-market, distribution channels and partnering as well as market insights.

Celine Vignal has extensive experience leading marketing and communications activities: prior to joining Zyxio, she worked and lived in Europe where she managed award-winning programs in the hospitality and entertainment fields.
